name: G1 Smart Watch
description: ZPPSNFIT G1 Smart Watch, 1.43’’ AMOLED Smart Watches for Men Women (Answer/Make Call), Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Activity Tracker, Pedometer for Android iOS
details: Bluetooth Call and Message Notification: Smart watch is equipped with built-in hd speaker, after connecting to your smartphone via bluetooth, you can answer, make calls, receive notifications of social media messages through vibrating alerts.

HD Touch Screen and Colorful Dial: The AMOLED smart watch is equipped with 466x466 ultra-large HD full-touch screen with outstanding sensitivity. You can choose your own favorite photo to switch dials by H Band APP.

150+ Sports Modes and IP68 Waterproof: The AMOLED smartwatch supports multiple sports modes, including running, cycling, walking, football etc. and record your data. The waterproof smartwatch can be used in many activities.

24-Hour Health Monitoring: Smart watch adopting advanced sensors, accurately monitors and records your healthy data, providing comprehensive sleep quality analysis. Note: The watch is not recommended to take shower and swimming.

Multifunctional and Long Battery Life: Smart watch has multiple functions such as find your phone, sedentary reminder, music control etc. The sport tracker with 5-7 days of normal use and about 30 days of standby time.
